actionTemplate.title: Lift a drooping brow tail
steps: Set the goal: brow tail level with or slightly higher than brow head
Clean up: remove hair above brow head and below brow tail
Fill the lower edge of brow head and the upper edge of brow tail
Keep the brow line smoother and less curved downward
Blend so brow head stays soft and lighter

rationaleTemplate: Raising the tail makes the eyes look lifted and brighter
Edge adjustments change the brow angle without over-drawing
